description:
Sept 20-21: Banff Trail to University (Single Tracking)

Banff Trail and University stations will NOT be fully closed, this is a partial closure.

The northbound track will be closed at Banff Trail and University stations for maintenance work starting Saturday, September 20 until the early hours of Monday, September 22.

For more information please visit calgarytransit.com/ctrain-service

Sept 20-21: Somerset-Bridlewood to Anderson closure

The Red Line will be closed between Somerset-Bridlewood and Anderson stations starting Saturday, September 20 until the early hours of Monday, September 22.

Red Line trains coming from the north and downtown will terminate at Anderson Station. For travel between Somerset-Bridlewood and Anderson Stations, we'll have shuttle buses replacing train service.

For more information please visit calgarytransit.com/ctrain-service
The inbound elevator at Sunalta Station is temporarily out of service.
